attributes.action: Create Michael Anthony Rowan a life peer of the House of Lords as per the Life Peerages Act 1958
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because he's extremely bored and wants to rant and rave whilst under the influence of 40 year old single malt whisky. He also believes he's fully qualified for the position as he has an AS Level in Government and Politics (E grade) and he's well fed and incredibly pompous.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
